name: Amazon Crime
description:
Your mom always told you you can’t steal. But shouldn’t you? Take packages and put them in your blue stash. Make sure not to get caught red-handed or get hit by a car!!

Controls:  keyboard keys w,a,s,d

Made by:

Alon Hoffman

Yoav Feinstein

Shimshon Polak
